snippet.title: [Multiplayer Trailer] Reggie, His Cousin, Two Scientists and Most Likely the End of the World
snippet.description:
The gravity-defying world of Reggie, His Cousin, Two Scientists and Most Likely the End of the World is expanding with two new multiplayer modes! Play through the entire game with a friend in Dynamic Split-Screen mode, where the game screen will automatically split to give each player their own view of the action, and Synergy Mode where one player controls Reggie and the other player controls gravity. 

Reggie, His Cousin, Two Scientists and Most Likely the End of the World launches worldwide in 2025!

Wishlist on Steam: https://t.co/gcmyG3NjWj

Follow us!
https://www.reggiegame.com 
https://www.twitter.com/reggiethegame
https://www.instagram.com/reggiethegame/

#videogames #indiegame #gamedev #gametrailers #multiplayer
